com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases

Class ExtendedEntity<T extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases.ExtendedEntity<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - type of Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonEntity

    public class ExtendedEntity<T extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    Extends the methods provided by the Entity Bukkit class.

      • isInWater

        public boolean isInWater()
        Gets whether the Entity is submerged in water (subsequently, extinguising any fire). This method does not update the state, it merely reads it.
        Returns:
        True if this Entity is in water, False if not

      • isInWater

        public boolean isInWater(boolean update)
        Gets whether the Entity is submerged in water (subsequently, extinguising any fire)
        Parameters:
        update - option: True to update this state by checking for water blocks nearby
        Returns:
        True if this Entity is in water, False if not

      • setAllowTeleportation

        public void setAllowTeleportation(boolean allow)
        Sets whether an Entity is allowed to teleport upon entering a portal right now. This state is live-updated based on whether the Entity moved into/away from a portal.
        Parameters:
        allow - whether to allow portal entering

      • getAllowTeleportation

        public boolean getAllowTeleportation()
        Gets whether an Entity is allowed to teleport upon entering a portal right now. This state is live-updated based on whether the Entity moved into/away from a portal.
